title: Win It Weekly: Northwave Shoes
content:
How does Win it Weekly work?

Simply fill out the form below for your chance to win a pair of Northwave Extreme Pro road shoes.

Prize:

  • Pair of Northwave Extreme Pro Road Shoes
  • MSRP $399.99

Prize details:

The Northwave Extreme Pro road shoes include the PowerShape Carbon 15 sole which features the exclusive Powershape system on the arch of the foot that ensures 100% of rider power is transferred to the pedals without wasting any energy. Made with the patented XFrame 2 construction, the upper transfers every watt of power while providing the snuggest even fit with no pressure points. The shoes also have a Speedplay adapter compatible for the lowest stack height between foot and pedal.
